TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An anticancer drug that belongs to the family of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors. Batimastat is a matrix metalloproteinase inhibitor.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento contra el cáncer que es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis. El batimastat es un inhibidor de la metaloproteasa de la matriz.
